name: Wormhole (Josh Hardy)
description:
You are the last stand against an invasion of aliens. Give everything you have to stop them from getting through the wormhole and space jumping to your home planet.

A small game I made to take a break from a larger project.

If there are any bugs let me know. Only playable on PC as this was just a quick thing i made for fun, sorry :)

Everything was created from scratch including the amazing mothlike spaceship. The music however, was not created by me and instead i used freesound.org for the sounds.

Freeze - Justinvoke

Jet Woosh - Benboncan

Warping - LloyedEvans09

Explosion-OmarAlvardo
